description:
In Kyoto, Kaoru quickly notices something strange with Misao, as Misao comes back to the location where a fire was put out. At Megumi`s clinic, Omi awakens, bringing tears of relief to Juro. Meanwhile, a black tag is put on Tokuji`s toe to mark that he is dead. Kenshin and the others come back to Aoiya, where they learn from Omasu that Okina has woken up.
Source: Crunchyroll
